title: Labor Department Finds 31 Children Cleaning Meatpacking Plants
description: Packers Sanitation Services, a food safety contractor, hired children as young as 13 to clean dangerous equipment on overnight shifts, the department said. Several suffered chemical burns.
dc:creator: Remy Tumin

media:content.media:description: An image that the Labor Department included in paperwork seeking an injunction against Packers Sanitation Services showed a worker using a high-powered hose at a meatpacking plant in Worthington, Minn.
